page.title: 02THE ROYAL HOTEL VIEW
page.content: You can see lots of old buildings and warehouses from the Royal Hotel.There were lots of mud flats and the spine and bottom of a boat halfway buried under the mud.There was a sand bank about 250 yards out from the rocks.You could see big cranes and boats which were the start of{Avonmouth}and {Portbury}docks.There were lots of smoking chimneys.The Hotel was owned by the brewery Bass Charrington. There was a red buoy.You could see a small island out in the Bristol channel called{Denny Island.} STEVE WILLIAMS
